org.hyperledger.fabric.ledger

Interface Ledger


  • public interface Ledger
    Ledger representing the overall shared Transaction Data of the Network. It is composed of a number of collections, one being the public or world state, and other private data collections, including the implicit organizational collections. Ledger objects can be passed between methods if required. All operations on the Ledger directly or via any child object such as a Collection will be controlled by the supplied transactional context.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      Return the a collection based on the supplied name.

    • Method Detail

      • getLedger

        static Ledger getLedger(Context ctx)
        Get the Ledger instance that represents the current ledger state. Any interactions with the ledger will be done under the control of the transactional context supplied. The ledger object may be passed to other methods if required. A new instance is returned on each call.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context The Transactional context to use for interactions with this ledger
        Returns:
        Ledger instance

      • getCollection

        Collection getCollection(java.lang.String name)
        Return the a collection based on the supplied name. Private Data collections can be accessed by name. A new instance of a Collection object is returned on each call.
        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:
        Collection instance

      • getDefaultCollection

        Collection getDefaultCollection()
        Return the World State collection. A new instance of a Collection object is returned on each call.
        Returns:
        Collection instance

      • getOrganizationCollection

        Collection getOrganizationCollection(java.lang.String mspid)
        Return a implicit organization collection. Given the mspid of the ogranization return the private data collection that is implicitly created A new instance of a Collection object is returned on each call.
        Parameters:
        mspid - String Organization's mspid
        Returns:
        Collection instance
